title: It's Been 18 Years Since One Piece Fans Said Farewell to the Best Ship
author: Megan Peters
description: Article commemorating the 18th anniversary of Episode 312 and discussing the Going Merry's farewell as the most beloved moment in One Piece according to a 25th anniversary poll.

title: One Piece: Episode 312 â€“ Farewell Merry
author: Linda (animemiz)
description: Personal blog review of Episode 312 written shortly after the episode aired. The reviewer describes being in tears throughout the entire episode and discusses the emotional impact of the Going Merry's farewell.

title: One Piece: Why the Going Merry Dying Was So Emotionally Impactful
author: CBR Staff
description: CBR article analyzing why the Going Merry's death had such a profound emotional impact on fans, exploring the themes and storytelling techniques used in the episode.

title: Episode 312 - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
description: Comprehensive wiki page for Episode 312 with episode details, summary, manga chapters covered, trivia, and other reference information.

title: Chapter 430 - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
description: Wiki page for manga Chapter 430 'A Light Snow of Reminiscence Falls', which Episode 312 adapts. Includes chapter summary and details about the Going Merry's farewell.

title: Klabautermann - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
description: Detailed wiki page explaining the Klabautermann ship spirit concept, its appearances in One Piece, and its basis in Germanic folklore.

title: 312: 'Thank You, Merry! Snow Falls over the Parting Sea!'
author: Never Watched One Piece
description: Blog post summarizing and analyzing Episode 312, including key plot points, character reactions, and emotional context of the Going Merry's farewell.

title: One Piece Episode 312 - IMDb
author: IMDb
description: IMDb page for Episode 312 with a 9.6 rating, making it one of the highest-rated episodes in the series. Includes user reviews and ratings.
